Ministry of Foreign Bangers

Ministry of Foreign Bangers

  • Spotify playlist

The Ministry of Foreign Bangers (BB) makes our Kingdom groovier and more prosperous and works to create diverse and sick parties. BB also supports Dutch nationals abroad 24/7 by supplying only the fattest of tunes. We do all this together with our partners at home and abroad. Working for the Netherlands, worldwide.

Markie 'heb je nog water' Rutte
Pieter 'pilsbaas' Omtzigt

What is the Ministry of Foreign Bangers?

The Ministry of Foreign Bangers is a collective effort to index the sickest non-english, non-dutch bangers. The Spotify playlist supplies both foreign and domestic actors with a peak experience at parties. Push your diplomatic edge with this carefully mananged list of fat tunes.

How can I assist in this geopolitical project?

There's a collaborative Spotify playlist. Just follow it and you should be able to add songs. Please limit your addition to non-english, non-dutch tunes that knock your knickers off.

Are you in any way associated with the dutch government?

No, we just nicked their styling, which is completely legal as this is a parody. Hopefully.
